Although single 40 minute session exercise low exercise intensity improve insulin sensitivity , investigator anticipate adaptation two week exercise training ( 6 session/wk ; 12 session total ) improve insulin sensitivity accompany reduction fatty acid intermediate reduction marker pro-inflammatory activation muscle . investigator anticipate change insulin sensitivity , fatty acid partitioning , pro-inflammatory marker day last session 12 wk train program ( without weight-loss ) similar measure 2 week training . investigator anticipate insulin sensitivity , accumulation fatty acid intermediate , pro-inflammatory activation markedly improve 10 % weight loss measure day exercise . investigator would expect improvement Insulin sensitivity , accumulation fatty acid intermediate , marker inflammatory stress significantly attenuate measured 3 day recent exercise session , beneficial effect 10 % weight loss metabolic endpoint persist compare weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Progressive Metabolic Adaptations Low Intensity Exercise Training Weight Loss
DOC.criteria: body mass index [ BMI ] : 3045 kg/m2 ; All woman must premenopausal ; Nonexerciser ( regularly plan exercise/physical activity ) Hematocrit ≤ 34 % ; Fasting plasma glucose concentration ≥ 125 mg/dL ; Weight instability ≥ ±5 lbs past month ; Taking medication know affect lipid and/or glucose metabolism ; evidence and/or history cardiovascular frank metabolic disease ; pregnancy actively breast feeding
